style: .sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-container{--sf-gutter-x:1rem;--sf-gutter-y:0;width:100%;padding-right:calc(var(--bs-gutter-x) * .5);padding-left:calc(var(--bs-gutter-x) * .5);margin-right:auto;margin-left:auto}.sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-recomm-section{padding-bottom:50px}.sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-container *{box-sizing:border-box}.sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-row{display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap;margin-top:calc(-1 * var(--sf-gutter-y));margin-right:calc(-.5 * var(--sf-gutter-x));margin-left:calc(-.5 * var(--sf-gutter-x))}.sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-row>*{flex-shrink:0;width:100%;max-width:100%;padding-right:calc(var(--sf-gutter-x) * .5);padding-left:calc(var(--sf-gutter-x) * .5);margin-top:var(--sf-gutter-y)}.sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-col{flex:1 0 0%}.sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-col-1{flex:0 0 auto;width:8.33333333%}.sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-col-2{flex:0 0 auto;width:16.66666667%}.sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-col-3{flex:0 0 auto;width:25%}.sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-col-4{flex:0 0 auto;width:33.33333333%}.sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-col-5{flex:0 0 auto;width:41.66666667%}.sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-col-6{flex:0 0 auto;width:50%}.sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-col-7{flex:0 0 auto;width:58.33333333%}.sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-col-8{flex:0 0 auto;width:66.66666667%}.sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-col-9{flex:0 0 auto;width:75%}.sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-col-10{flex:0 0 auto;width:83.33333333%}.sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-col-11{flex:0 0 auto;width:91.66666667%}.sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-col-12{flex:0 0 auto;width:100%}.sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-flex{display:flex}.sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-flex-column{flex-direction:column}.sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-align-center{align-items:center}.sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-product-list{max-width:440px}.sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-product-list>.sf-product-item:not(:last-child){margin-bottom:20px}.sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-product-image-container{position:relative;overflow:hidden;height:100%;cursor:pointer;box-sizing:border-box}.sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-widget-title{width:100%;margin-top:unset;line-height:1.5;text-align:center;font-weight:500;overflow-wrap:break-word;font-size:22px;font-family:unset;text-align:center;}.sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-product-image{transition:transform .3s ease-in-out;width:100%;height:100%;margin:0 auto;object-fit:cover}.sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-product-title{line-height:1.5;overflow:hidden;text-overflow:ellipsis;display:-webkit-box;-webkit-line-clamp:2;-webkit-box-orient:vertical;cursor:pointer;word-break:break-all}.sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-product-price{color:#000;font-size:16px;margin-left:8px;}.sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-product-offer-price{color:red;margin-bottom:10px}.sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-add-to-cart-btn{align-items:center;border:none;background:#000;font-size:12px;width:100%;min-height:32px;outline:0;padding:8px 8px;overflow-wrap:break-word;position:relative;text-align:center;justify-content:center;cursor:pointer;min-width:40px;line-height:1.2;color:#fff;border-radius:3px}.sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-out-of-stock{display:none;align-items:center;border:none;background:#000;font-size:12px;width:100%;min-height:32px;outline:0;padding:8px 8px;overflow-wrap:break-word;position:relative;text-align:center;justify-content:center;cursor:pointer;min-width:40px;line-height:1.2;background-color:grey!important;color:#fff!important;cursor:not-allowed!important;animation:none!important;border-radius:3px}.sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-product-variants-dropdown{background-image:none!important;font-family:inherit;cursor:pointer;width:100%;height:33px;color:#000;border:1px solid;background:0 0;padding:0 18px 0 8px;overflow:hidden;text-overflow:ellipsis;white-space:nowrap;font-weight:400;font-size:12px;line-height:20px;box-sizing:none;border-color:#e9ebec;color:#232323;margin-top:10px;border-radius:6px}.sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-cart-container{margin:10px 0 0}.sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-product-variants-dropdown option{padding:5px}.sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-product-link{display:flex;align-items:flex-end;overflow:hidden;text-decoration:none;color:inherit;}.sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-brand-container-list{display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:flex-start;margin-top:15px;margin-left:130px}.sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-brand-container-list a{text-decoration:none;color:#6d7175}.sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-brand-content{font-weight:500}.sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-select-btn{display:flex;align-items:center;border:none;background:#000;font-size:12px;width:115%;min-height:32px;outline:0;padding:8px 8px;overflow-wrap:break-word;position:relative;text-align:center;justify-content:center;cursor:pointer;min-width:40px;line-height:1.2;color:#fff;border-radius:3px} .sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-product-discount{ display:none !important; } .sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-divider{ display: none !important;} .sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-space-between{ display:flex; flex-direction:column; justify-content: space-between} .sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-price-container{ display:flex; flex-direction:column-reverse;align-items:flex-end;} .sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-mt-15 { margin-top: 15px; } .sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-product-onsale{ margin-right: 0px !important; } @media screen and (max-width:768px){ .sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-price-container{ margin-left:30px }} var(--sf-gutter-y));margin-right:calc(-.5 * var(--sf-gutter-x));margin-left:calc(-.5 * var(--sf-gutter-x))}.sf-equal-height .sf-product-grid{display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(var(--sf-grid-count),calc((100% - 80px)/ var(--sf-grid-count)));align-content:center;column-gap:25px;row-gap:20px}.sf-product-image{transition:transform .3s ease-in-out;width:100%;height:100%;margin:0 auto;object-fit:contain;aspect-ratio:1}.sf-product-title{margin-bottom:5px;color:#000;word-wrap:break-word;overflow:hidden;text-overflow:ellipsis;display:-webkit-box;-webkit-line-clamp:1;-webkit-box-orient:vertical;line-height:1.5}.sf-price-container{line-height:1.5}.sf-product-offer-price{color:red;margin-bottom:10px}.sf-out-of-stock{display:none;background-color:grey!important;color:#fff!important;cursor:not-allowed!important;animation:none!important;align-items:center;border:none;background:#000;font-size:12px;width:100%;min-height:32px;outline:0;padding:8px 8px;overflow-wrap:break-word;position:relative;text-align:center;justify-content:center;cursor:pointer;min-width:40px;line-height:1.2;border-radius: 3px;}.sf-cart-container{margin:15px 0 0}.sf-product-variants-dropdown option{padding:5px} .sf-variants-container{} .sf-product-link{display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;overflow:hidden;text-decoration: none;color:inherit;}@media screen and (max-width:768px){.sf-product-grid{grid-template-columns:repeat(var(--sf-grid-count),1fr)}}@media screen and (min-width:769px) and (max-width:1200px){.sf-product-grid{grid-template-columns:repeat(3,1fr)}}.sf-brand-container{display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;margin-top:15px}.sf-brand-container a{text-decoration:none;color:#6d7175}.sf-brand-content{font-weight:500}.sf-select-btn{display:flex;align-items:center;border:none;background:#000;font-size:12px;width:100%;min-height:32px;outline:0;padding:8px 8px;overflow-wrap:break-word;position:relative;text-align:center;justify-content:center;cursor:pointer;min-width:40px;line-height:1.2;color:#fff;border-radius:3px;} .sf-row.sf-equal-height, .sf-row.sf-equal-height .sf-row{ height:auto  } .sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-pl-0{ padding-left: 0px; } .sf-cross-sell-grid .sf-discount-text{ padding-bottom:20px}
